titleStmt.title: An elegy on that grand example of loyalty, valour, and conduct, Sir Edward Spragg unfortunately drowned (after incomparable proof of heroick gallantry) in the late engagement with the Dutch, August the 11th, 1673.
titleStmt.author: S. W.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: An elegy on Sir Edward Spragg.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
